entries: Town Watch/Guard/Soldier

action.name: Spear (One-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spear (Thrown)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spear (Two-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.
Watch Detective

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: The detective uses a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The detective deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage when it hits a target and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the detective doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spy makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.
Tracker

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The tracker has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.
Professional Bounty Hunter

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bounty hunter makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a cudgel attack.

action.name: Longsword (One-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longsword (Two-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Cudgel
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

{@b Ammunition:} You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon (see "Improvised Weapons" later in the section). A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

action.name: Bola
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/50 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

A bola is a cord with weights on each end thrown at the legs of a fleeing target. A large or smaller creature hit must succeed in a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or become {@condition grappled}. {@dc 12} Strength check to break. The bola has 4 hit points. A bounty hunter may use a Bola during an attack of opportunity even if the target has used the Withdraw action.
Captain of the Watch

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Captain makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword (One-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longsword (Two-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the Captain can utter a special command or warning whenever a non hostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw.

The creature can add {@dice 1d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand the Captain. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the Captain is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Brave
entries: The Captain has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Captain adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the Captain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
Amateur Bounty Hunter

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thug makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Truncheon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage.

{@b Ammunition:} You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon (see "Improvised Weapons" later in the section). A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: Amateur bounty hunters have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one ally of the bounty hunter is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}
Bounty Hunter Mage

action.name: Staff (One-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Staff (Two-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:
